alert.note: Alert for Cass; Jackson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 11:22PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cass and southeastern Jackson Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lee`s Summit, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Grandview, Raymore, Grain Valley, Pleasant Hill, Greenwood, Lake Lotawana, Lake Winnebago, Lone Jack, Lake Tapawingo, Baldwin Park, Unity Village and Tarsney Lakes. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 20 and 29. Interstate 470 between mile markers 6 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Missouri.
